title: Manga wo Yomeru Ore ga Sekai Saikyou ~Yometachi to Sugosu Ki mama na Seikatsu~ - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Arranged Marriage   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Easy Going Life   Genius Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage of Convenience   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Playful Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Shota   Skill Assimilation   S*aves
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description:
The world I reincarnated into was a world that enabled you to use magic after having read a Grimoire.

And the Grimoire’s contents areーー you wouldn’t believe it- it’s 「Manga」.

This world’s people would take around a year to read a single Grimoire (Manga)

While for me, it would not take an hour, as it was「Manga」

Interpreting and understanding all kinds of Grimoires, the 6 year old me who became the World’s Strongest Master Mage, welcomed brides that were also 6 years old, and started living a carefree life…!!>
